name: Looty
tagline: Looty! A tool for Path of Exile that makes inventory searching fun!
body:
### Welcome to the Looty homepage.

Looty is a tool for Path of Exile that makes inventory searching easier.

It is an extension for Google Chrome that downloads inventory data from the 
Path of Exile website. You need to be logged into the site in order for it 
to be able to download the data.

Source code available on [github](https://github.com/benjaminjackman/looty).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
